name: The Terror Of The Unknown
description:
Ever imagined constructing your own pile of madness, a destructive creature with powers combining spider venom, zombie grasp and LASERS? Wait no more! Make all your horrible nightmares come true and destroy the poor, disgusting creature your opponent made! 

Required to play:

  • A friend (or enemy)
  • Two controllers, we recommend XBOX ones!
  • Full-HD device (1920x1080)
  • Ability to overcome gag reflex

Team

  • Bartłomiej Sieczka / Coding / Twitter
  • Martyna Zych / Graphic design + Music / Twitter
  • Tomasz Zych / UI design + Art / www
